law.catch_line: The sales and use tax does not apply to a sale of:...
law.text:
The sales and use tax does not apply to a sale of:
a clam or oyster rake, crab bait, crab or eel pot, or fish net;
a dredge, handscrape, or hand or patent tong; or
fuel or a repair part for a commercial fishing vessel or for a vessel otherwise used for commercial purposes.
